title: Papa no Iukoto wo Kikinasai!
original_name: パパのいうことを聞きなさい！
sinopse:
Papa no Iukoto wo Kikinasai! explains the day-to-day of a university student that has to live with three sisters that are not from his family: a tsundere (14 years), a little demon (10 years) and a small girl (3 years).

(Source: Animesque)
